feed.title: maggie4apple
feed.subtitle: An engaging 1-3 sentence description of your lab.

entry.title: Learning eeg
entry.content:
EEG Tutorial

  1. Where do we start: https://eeglab.org/tutorials/

  2. A clean/resting state human EEG dataset to test: R:\Ferris-Lab\liu.chang1\DATA\SampleData\2019-12-19_humanExampleData\Raw

  3. iCanClean to remove motion artifacts with the dual-layer electrode design: https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/23/19/8214
entry.summary: EEG Tutorial Where do we start: https://eeglab.org/tutorials/ A clean/resting state human EEG dataset to test: R:\Ferris-Lab\liu.chang1\DATA\SampleData\2019-12-19_humanExampleData\Raw iCanClean to remove motion artifacts with the dual-layer electrode design: https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/23/19/8214
